headlines.skill: web and mobile application development, specializing in React and React Native and co-author of a book on React

objectives.text: Seeking a position among top-notch team of developers, to utilize my skills, and abilities to create cutting-edge applications for mobile and web. The ideal position would challenge me to learn and adapt, and fulfil my cravings to learn new technologies and constantly self-improve.

summary.text: Over 9 Years production level experience in React and React Native and co-authored a book on React.
Highly proficient in front-end technologies like React.js, React Native and TypeScript, coupled with hands-on experience in backend frameworks and languages, including Node.js, Java, and PHP.
Expert in JavaScript, ES2015+, React JS, Redux, Flux, Typescript, Vue.js, GraphQL, npm, Node js, HTML5, CSS, SASS, LESS.
Expert in Git and version control and DevOps with various CI / CD tools for builds and cloud based deployments.
Full stack developer with various technologies like JavaScript, PHP and Java and cloud.
Extensive experience with modern Serverless and Headless architectures, developing cloud-native applications on AWS and Google ecosystems, and implementing Jamstack solutions.
Extensive knowledge of responsive web design, cross-device compatibility, modern SEO practices, accessibility, and performance optimization for enhanced user experience.
Adept at integrating APIs and microservices, leveraging RESTful and GraphQL APIs along with AWS services like Lambda, DynamoDB, and API Gateway to deliver robust serverless solutions.
Skilled in collaborating with UX/UI designers to create user-friendly interfaces, ensuring technical feasibility, and experienced in using design tools like Sketch, Photoshop, and Illustrator.
An earnest believer in clean coding standards and conventions, semantic HTML and CSS, accessibility, W3C standards and best practices.
Proficient with unit testing and build automation with Node, Grunt, Gulp and Webpack.
Worked using a variety of Agile techniques like Scrum, Kanban and Certified SAFeÂ® 4 Practitioner.

skills.title: Source Control, Servers and Devops Tools

projects.title: IHYP
projects.headline: IHYP is an innovative mobile app in the medical field that enables practitioners to assess and quantify pain levels using sound, paving the way for improved pain management strategies through data-driven insights.
highlights: Led the development of the app, establishing best practices and overcoming technical challenges related to complex user authentication, secure login flows, and role-based access management.
Designed and implemented a robust user management system, including features for role-based permissions and granular access control, to ensure secure data handling in a healthcare setting.
Integrated comprehensive logging and monitoring solutions, enabling detailed tracking of user activity and system performance for compliance and operational transparency.

Utilized React Native with TypeScript for mobile development, Appcenter for CI/CD, and Firebase for serverless functions and NoSQL database, ensuring scalability and real-time data handling across user sessions.

projects.title: Post+
projects.headline: Contributed to the development of Australia Post's next-generation POS (Point of Sale) system, a comprehensive platform supporting various integrated services.
highlights: Led the development of both functional and non-functional requirements for the POS system using React.js, Electron, and AWS, ensuring a robust and scalable solution.
Implemented Micro Frontend (MFE) architecture, enabling modular integration and enhanced maintainability. Utilized GitLab Pipelines and AWS for efficient CI/CD workflows and deployment automation.

Tackled complex system requirements and optimizations, focusing on the MFE host to resolve scalability and integration challenges within the composite architecture, ensuring seamless interaction between services.

projects.title: myDNA Pregnancy App
projects.headline: mmyDNA Pregnancy is an innovative app that tailors the company's services to meet the unique needs of pregnant women.
highlights: Developed a reusable framework and a common component library in React Native, streamlining development for both the existing app and future applications.
Played a key role in building the in-house React Native capability, establishing best practices to ensure scalable and maintainable code.
Implemented DevOps processes for mobile app CI/CD pipelines using Appcenter, ensuring efficient and reliable app delivery.
Delivered the myDNA Pregnancy app, leveraging the established framework with React Native and TypeScript to create a seamless user experience tailored to the needs of expectant mothers.

projects.title: The 2021 Australian Census
projects.headline: The 2021 Census was a great success for Australian Bureau of Statistics (ABS) and PwC with over 8 million submissions.
highlights: Helped build applications for heavy traffic using serverless and headless architechture.
Took ownership of delivery of critical modules for the project and worked on continous deployments using CI/CD pipelines with bamboo and AWS.
Took up full stack development and wrote Lambda in Java to complement React JS in the front-end to deliver a robust application.
Liased with the clients and stake holder to fast pace the traditionally slow process and improve quality.
Worked on assesibilty to earn a AA rating and the project has recieved accolades in media as a giant leap for digital accessibility in Australia for a Government undertaking.

projects.title: Custom Fleet Drive
projects.headline: CustomFleet provide fleet management and leasing solutions, needed a mobile application for their customers across Australia and New Zealand to make the management of fleet efficient, on iOS and Android.
highlights: Led the native development effort, dictating best practices and strategy
Built development environment from scratch including mock APIs for the Greenfields project.
User Authentication and APIs with OAuth 2.0.
Push Notification to targeted users with AWS integration.

projects.title: The React Workshop
projects.headline: The React Workshop is a book published by Packt, a leading global publisher of technology books for computer programmers. The book is aimed at programming beginners and allows users to learn in a practical, hands-on way. I have authored two chapters in the book about React Components and State and Props in React.
highlights: Explored and analysed the philosophy behind application developement and in particular React Development.
Delved deep into React to understand the inner workings which will help me further in my journey with React.
Created engaging content and worked with SMEs and editors to match the required high quality standards.
Created demo applications that would both intrigue the learners' interest and teach the skills in React

projects.title: GetgoingPT
projects.headline: Get Going are on a mission to make our communities healthier and happier, and to reflect their brand and values, we built them a new site
highlights: Headless CMS and Serverless Architecture to provide optimum and fast experience.
Fully automated CI/CD & headless e-commerce with BigCommerce
Full Stack JavaScript with front-end built on Gatsby with React and Typescript and back-end on Strapi and node.
technologies: Lambda, EC2, Amplify, S3 from AWS

projects.title: Leonardo Fernandez Jewellery
projects.headline: A brand new website to create a new digital identity for the artisans who craft bespoke jewellery.
highlights: Built a high performing website using Jamstack which is an architecture designed to make the web faster, more secure, and easier to scale.
Full Stack JavaScript with front-end built on Gatsby with React and Typescript and back-end on Strapi and node.
Serverless Cloud Functions to allow for user interactions and persistent storage.

projects.title: ANOMSX
projects.headline: ANOMSX is a a modern and streamlined web application built to assist our airport customers in efficiently and effectively managing their environmental impact.
highlights: A complex application with requirement to visualize huge data on screen and map, challenging the limits of what a web application can do.
Built a design system as an npm package to be used accross projects in the organisation.
Created build and release pipelines in Azure for Continous Integration and Continous Deployment.
Worked on various components and custom state management with Flux, also extensively worked on maps with MapBox and Deck.gl.

projects.title: Dusk&Dawn
projects.headline: A successfull e-commerce platform to launch a new brand of matteresses in the consumer market
highlights: Built the e-commerce solution from scratch to empower the new brand.
Worked on integrations with various systems for payments, emails, shipping, analytics and content publishing
Built custom widgets like cart and shipping check to enhance the user experience
Created a headless CMS system to help the client build a custom theme beyond what the SAAS platform allowed
Built multiple CI/CD pipelines to cater for multiple components of the system to allow a seamless experience for the client.

projects.title: Solotel multisite
projects.headline: Solotel is one of Australia's largest hospitality groups with venues in Brisbane and Sydney. For it's 30+ restaurants, bars, pubs, bistros, Solotel needed implementation of a new customer facing Digital Platform including a new Reservation Management System (Dimmi), CMS (Drupal 8), and rebuild their 30+ websites.
highlights: Led the front end development for the project.
Built drupal components in twig and worked on integration.
Built many vue components used across the sites and using multiple configurations.

projects.title: my.monash
projects.headline: my.monash provides convenient access to important information and personalised services on desktop and via the App. For its users, my.monash not only provides easy access to dynamic, real-time information and frequently accessed services but also personalised content. It has a seamless transition between desktop and mobile devices.
highlights: Application used by over a hundred thousand users every day.
Worked in a cohesive, fast-paced team with SAFe agile, working with the business to deliver features.
Development along with unit and functional testing, operations support.

projects.title: My online profile
projects.headline: My online profile built with JSON and REACT. I love the fact that the JSON has all the nitty-gritty details like dates, but can be hidden in view or can have different views.
highlights: Built from scratch to better understand Webpack and React and continue working with ES2015.
Component-based SPA to allow easy maintenance and to change or add features.

projects.title: Persuit
projects.headline: PERSUITâ¢ is a secure, online marketplace for client organisations and leading firms to resource secondments, bank legal hours and manage RFPs. Persuit is a revolutionary approach in the way these top-notch professionals are hired. This app would be a huge improvement from the current system which is handled in email inboxes and over the phone.
highlights: Built complex and simple features with new and existing components in react according to the specs. Wrote unit tests for testable features.
Styled various features and pages of the project using SASS, with support for mobile, tablet and desktop form factors.
Worked with an excellent team of developers to strict coding and development process standards.

projects.title: Griffith Hack
projects.headline: Griffith Hack has been the leading Australian-based IP firm, little known outside the intellectual property industry. This exercise was to reposition the brand with colourful new visual identity and bold brand strategy.
highlights: Built pages and objects with relationships and schema. Created layouts and styling for the pages to match the design, keeping a modular approach for reusability.
Built customisable templates to allow the client to change the layouts, themes, colours, images and content of the pages easily.
Custom AJAX for multiple pages with complex tagging and filtering mechanism.

projects.title: Thermann
projects.headline: Thermann Hot water systems were launched by Reece in the Australian Market. Although being a large site, the deliverables for the site were static pages with assets. So this was built with Smarty PHP templates which then built a static version written into HTML and CSS.

projects.title: Whitbread Insurance Brokers
projects.headline: Whitbread Insurance Brokers has been the trusted advisor to commercial and family businesses since 1978. This was another rebranding project.
highlights: Built the website with various pages, layouts and features according to the rebranded designs.
Custom AJAX for multiple features and with a filtering mechanism for the Social media posts.
Custom Lucene search with a custom layout.
Multiple contact forms on different pages to customisable contacts.

projects.title: ShineWing
projects.headline: In February 2015, Australian accounting firm, Moore Stephens Melbourne, became part of ShineWing International, Chinaâs largest indigenous accounting firm - forming ShineWing Australia.

projects.title: Healthy Together Victoria
projects.headline: The Program Victorian Government intiative to bring communities together in a united effort for better health.
highlights: Being a government site, the focus was cross browser compatibility and accessibility while making the website still look good and interactive.

projects.title: Corrs Chambers Westgarth
projects.headline: Corrs is a top tier legal firm in Australia, with people with a lot of eperience in every sector. This site was one of the largest site by content and it challenged the limits of using SilverStripe and the server stack.
highlights: Developed various features and pages according to the spec.
Worked on analytics and controlling robots crawling the website.
Wrote algoriths for various features like popularity
Worked on custom search.

projects.title: TD Bank Android Application
projects.headline: The engagement was to port TD Bank iPad application, which was built in-house, to Android and to make it responsive so as to fit all mobile and tablet form factors.
highlights: Assess the current application and retrofit the page into mobile by making necessary changes.
Customize the existing Dojo widgets to run on various form factors with performance optimization to run on Android Devices using IBM Worklight and Eclipse.

work.summary: Post+ is a new Point Of Sale system that aims to deliver a flexible, modern platform allowing complex services to be delivered through multiple channels and touchpoints, enabling revenue growth and cost efficiencies while remediating risk for Australia Post.

highlights.text: Led the design and development of key features for the POS system, working extensively on the Micro Frontend (MFE) host and MFE APIs to enable modular integration and ensuring seamless front-end and back-end integration.
Implemented and optimized DevOps practices, streamlining deployment pipelines and enhancing system reliability.
Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to resolve complex technical challenges, ensuring high scalability and performance across the solution.
Utilized AWS services and serverless architectures to improve the overall system's flexibility and efficiency.

work.summary: Founded by the first qualified clinical geneticist in Australia, myDNA makes genetics accesible to common people using Personalised Medications test.  With just a simple at-home swab test, myDNA delivered actionable science to doctors.

highlights.text: Worked as a Senior Mobile Developer and helped create inhouse React Native capability along with DevOps.
Built a new iOS and Android app for new target audience.

work.address: 12 River Street, South Yarra VIC 3141, 627 Chapel St, South Yarra VIC 3141

work.summary: PwC Australia brings together people, business, technology and ideas to build trust in society and solve important problems. One of the Big Four, PwC ranks as the second-largest professional services network in the world.

highlights.text: Worked as a Full Stack Developer and DevOps to cater to project needs.
Built an application for the federal government with widespread use across Australia on AWS.
Worked on different approaches and paradigms to solve challenges and implemented serverless architecture.

work.summary: EMS Bruel & Kjaer is a global provider of continuous environmental monitoring services and solutions.
work.summary2: With Business as a Service (BAAS) model, they simplify operations for customers and provide a complete service, eliminating the need to purchase, integrate and maintain complex solutions.

highlights.text: Built a complex web application that visualises large data sets and related geospatial data.
Worked on React, GraphQL, Typescript, Mapbox, Deck.gl, DevOps with Azure DevOps
Resolved engineering challenges arising due to the amount of data and limitations of web and DOM.

work.position: Senior Front End Developer - React js
work.summary: Loud&Clear (now part of Avanade) is a team of digital natives who love building future-ready businesses. They do this by combining design thinking, data-driven insights and well-drilled development capabilities to build products and platforms that inspire and capture the imagination.

highlights.text: Worked on Drupal 8 multisite with Vue js and Sitecore 9 applications.
Led the front end development for projects.

work.summary: Custom Fleet, part of Element Fleet Management is Australia and New Zealandâs premier fleet management organisation and has global reach across more than 40 countries.

highlights.text: Built Custom Fleet's first mobile app for the Australian market.
Championed agile and scrum methodology and successfully completed the React Native Greenfields project in time.

work.summary: Monash university being Australia's largest university has complex business processes and systems. Worked for Student First Program that delivers services that are easier, simpler and faster for students and staff.

highlights.text: Worked with various stakeholders and involved all phases of feature development
Worked on a React JS Project, Node and npm packages
Huge focus on Agile methodologies and development using Scaled Agile Frame Execution (SAFe).
Did user research to build tools that would benefit them the most with iterative development.

work.summary: PERSUIT is an outside counsel management platform which enables client organizations to scope and receive competitive and easy to compare proposals from their law firms of choice
work.summary1: PERSUIT is a marketplace that caters to the needs of both sides of a legal relationship â the branded firms and the large and complex organisations who need their services. It is a private online real-time RFP and bidding platform which enables client organizations to scope and receive competitive and easy to compare proposals from their law firms of choice.

highlights.text: React JS SPA (single page application) with Node and Webpack.
Worked in a challenging environment with cutting edge technologies and adapted various new technologies and best practices.
Implemented agile and scrum methodology and adopted a hybrid process meeting the project needs.
Excelled in use of GIT, and extensively used git for code quality control with branching, reviews, merge, and feature release.

work.summary: Trout is a digital agency with diverse team of creative thinkers. They work with many famous brands and little companies that want to be great.

highlights.text: Built numerous interactive websites and applications for various clients of Trout as both Front End and Full Stack Developer
Improved development practices and dictated best practices. Worked to optimize websites using various techniques.

work.summary1: Cognizant is a Fortune 500 company with huge development centers in India and in 2015
work.summary: Cognizant was named world's fourth most admired IT services company by Fortune magazine in 2015, and I worked for Cognizant Interactive a branch that caters to the front-end needs of multiple projects.

highlights.text: Ensuring adherence to software quality standards and best practices and keep the team motivated and productive.
To ensure the features developed by the team are produced to the highest possible quality in the fastest possible time.
Provide solutions and support to different projects and developers on different areas like Responsive Web design, design, approaches and framework.

Evaluate different technologies and techniques and suggest the most optimum frameworks and architecture for projects. Provide solutions and support to different projects and developers on different areas like Responsive Web design, design, approaches and framework.
Train freshers and juniors in emmerging technologies.

work.summary: Now acquired by Pearson and rebranded to Person English, the company focuses on building a digital platform to enable learning and improving english for working professionals of different language skill levels.

highlights.text: Conceptualize and design the user interface for enhancement of the web/mobile applications and create wireframes. Develop cross-browser compatible applications with clean hand-coded XHTML and CSS and enhance UI with JQuery effects, Ajax and other dynamic content with clean CSS
Worked in high performing small Agile teams with scrum, building features of high business value.
Develop cross-browser compatible applications with clean hand-coded XHTML and CSS and enhance UI with JQuery effects, Ajax and other dynamic content with clean CSS

work.summary: I started my career at Netaxis designing and building website templates for various CMSs.

highlights.text: Design and develop layouts for PHP based web-applications and CMS like Magento, Zen Cart, Joomla, Wordpress and Drupal using clean hand coded XHTML, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX and CSS. Also, ensure cross-browser compatibility and debugging.

highlights: Saw end-to-end development right from gathering requirement, analysis, design, implementation, debugging to deployment.
